domain.name: Brand Vertical
domain.description: Top level entities that describe a Brands industry

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]

domain.description: Categories within Brand Verticals that narrow down the scope of Brands

entity.name: Automotive, Aircraft & Boat Business
entity.description: Brands, companies, advertisers and every non-person handle with the profit intent related to automobile, spacecraft, aircraft and boat manufacturing

entity.description: Brands, companies, advertisers and every non-person handle with the profit intent related to travel as airlines, travel agencies, hotels

data.text: @Delta here’s and idea on how to board your planes.  Main zone 1 - Window Seats Main zone 2 - middle seat main zone 3 aisle seats

urls.title: AFotD -Business- SKYTEAM BCN to ORD from 1,264€
urls.description: Today’s AFotD: DL/AF/KL low/off-peak season business class excursion non-refundable fares from Madrid (MAD) or Barcelona (BCN), Spain to USA

data.text: @tylermdmusic @Delta I would be happy to look into the possibility of changing the flights for you. Could you share your full name, booking code, ticket number, and new preferred travel dates via DM? I will return to you with the possibilities as soon as possible.

data.text: @Delta Hey Delta! Gotta let you know when you do it right! Nice job getting me to Buffalo during a blizzard and then back home to Sarasota. #happycustomer #buffaloblizzard
